description: Mapping of current /src file paths to new planned locations based on NewFolderStructurev3.md

main.js.notes: App entry point stays at top level

majorChanges: Core auth stores restructured from core/stores/auth/* to core/auth/stores/*
Firm store moved from core/stores/firm.js to core/firm/stores/firm.js
All organizer feature files renamed to documents feature
Feature-specific services, composables, and stores moved to respective feature folders
Shared components consolidated under shared/components with clear categorization
Router guards moved to feature-specific guard folders
Top-level views moved to feature-specific view folders (except Home, About, Testing, defaults)
